text: Hisashi Wakahara (born 21 April 1945) is a Japanese equestrian. He competed in two events at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Japan Category:Equestrians at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Asian Games medalists in equestrian Category:Equestrians at the 1986 Asian Games Category:Asian Games gold medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1986 Asian Games
title: Hisashi Wakahara
